content: Calling the person who posted the video and asking him to delete it has become a normal practice for maintaining stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: At present, the local authorities have fed back the list of all depositors to the streets and towns in the city, requiring them to immediately check the risk of petitioning and be on standby 24 hours a day to prevent depositors from going to the provincial capital and Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The reason for the investigation was that it was detected that some depositors were preparing to go to the provincial capital or Beijing to defend their rights.
Unexpectedly, some depositors in other places and rural areas did not know what happened to their money. They only learned about the Huatong bankruptcy after receiving the investigation call.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 12, a fire broke out at a auto parts warehouse in Meitian Village, Zhongluotan Town, Baiyun District, Guangzhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 12, in Sanfang Qixiang, Fuzhou, a man holding a sign to commemorate the 99th anniversary of the death of Sun Yat-sen was stopped by security guards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 12, Xinhua News Agency reported that people from all walks of life in the capital commemorated the 99th anniversary of the death of Sun Yat-sen in Zhongshan Park.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger posted a video saying that he had posted a video of a fire in a dormitory at Yancheng Vocational and Technical College in Jiangsu Province on Bilibili. The next day, he received a phone call from the Yancheng Public Security Bureau, asking him "Why did you post such a small fire on this (Bilibili)?" and told him that the video had been sent overseas by "hostile forces" and had caused a bad influence, and asked him to delete it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 12, the first and second volumes of the English version of "Selected Works of Xi Jinping" were published.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 11, a blogger filmed a video recording an old man who ate only one carrot all day.
During the conversation, we learned that the old man was going to another place to ask for the salary that was owed to him for 10 years. The old man said: "I am too weak... The boss of the other party told me to sue wherever I want."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 12 (Released) Liaoning. Several elderly people defended their rights outside the Liaoning Provincial High People's Court.
An elderly person kept shouting "See the leader, see the leader" outside the door
Another rights defender had a cardboard with a big "injustice" written on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 9, the Qinglongxia Scenic Area in Jiaozuo, Henan Province announced: From now on, all tourists who bring "Wahaha" series products to the scenic area can enjoy the preferential policy of free admission throughout the year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 11, Foshan, Guangdong. Workers demanded their wages in a garment factory.
During the on-site mediation, the police said: "This kind of situation now exists everywhere, not just here. Those who owe wages or go bankrupt, please be considerate."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In response to this, netizens replied, "What's there to be sympathetic about? I can't even afford cup noodles, has my boss sympathized with me?" "The mortgage loan won't sympathize with me."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @zhongchengfordh Is this beautiful? Then I wish your life is as beautiful as this uncle❤

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of March 12, in Bainaohui, Shenyang, Liaoning, netizens photographed staff wearing protective clothing entering to rescue people. An emergency command center was set up on site.
At noon on the 12th, according to the Heping District official account, 11 people on the basement floor of Bainaohui were sent to the hospital for examination due to physical discomfort. According to preliminary on-site investigation, it is suspected that carbon monoxide was produced by insufficient combustion of the basement heating boiler. None of the injuries are life-threatening at this time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/w96HOkTSI4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 10 (Released) Zhanjiang, Guangdong. The villagers of Tiaoshun Village gathered together to defend their rights because they questioned the former village committee secretary Huang Moukun and the current village committee secretary Huang Moudong for illegally reselling collective land, and had a fierce conflict with the people brought by the village committee secretary Huang Moudong.
According to the video, the former village committee secretary Huang Moukun of Tiaoshun Village was suspected of corruption and illegally reselling 428 acres of village collective land, making a profit of 850 million yuan, which was not deposited into the village collective account. The current village committee secretary Huang Moudong (Huang Moukun's nephew) told the villagers that the village committee had no money. In addition to illegally reselling land, as early as 2022, the village committee secretary Huang Moudong also joined forces with the street office secretary and urban management to forcibly demolish the buildings of 8 villagers. Recently, the villagers discovered that Huang Moudong had operated in secret and created many illegal bidding cases for collective assets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to other owners, the lady is a small vendor from another place and has been taken away to "assist in the investigation." They also said that because of the unfinished Kaisa City Plaza project, the owners were often harassed by the police and could not buy train tickets or plane tickets to Beijing. Previously, they would receive a call from the police whenever they tried to buy tickets. Recently, the APP directly displayed a system error and could not be purchased.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 12, Dingdian News reported. On March 4, a man in Hezhou Town, Qidong County, Hengyang, Hunan, broke into the cafeteria of Yousan Primary School in Hezhou Town, and injured two students with a "big knife", resulting in one death and one injury. The principal was scratched on his hand during the fight with the murderer. At that time, there were three lower-grade female students eating in the cafeteria. The assailant escaped and was arrested by the police on the same day.
According to local villagers, the assailant is about 40 years old and suspected of having a mental illness. It was said that he was a college graduate. Last year, the man broke into Yousan Primary School and scratched two students with a pencil sharpener. He was released after being arrested by the police.
On the morning of the 12th, the reporter called the village secretary of Sanyou Village. The other party said that the murderer was not from the village and asked the reporter to go to Hengyang City to understand the situation. Then the reporter called the Qidong County Police Station. The other party asked the reporter to go to Hezhou Town to understand the situation. After the reporter called the mayor of Hezhou Town, the mayor responded that the approval of the Propaganda Department was required...
fullContent:
3月12日，顶端新闻报道。3月4日在湖南衡阳祁东县河州镇一男子闯入河州镇友三小学食堂，持“大刀”伤害了两名学生，造成一死一伤。校长在和凶手搏斗中手部被划伤。当时食堂内有3名低年级女学生正在用餐，行凶者逃逸后于当天被警方抓获。
 据当地村民透露，行凶者今年40岁左右疑似有精神类疾病，之前据说是一名大学毕业生，去年该男子就曾闯入友三小学，并用削铅笔的小刀划伤了2名学生，在被警察抓获后又被释放。
12日上午，记者拨通三友村村支书电话，对方表示行凶男子不是本村人，并让记者到衡阳市了解情况。随后记者拨通祁东县派出所电话，对方表示让记者去河州镇了解情况，记者拨通河州镇镇长电话后，镇长回应需要宣传部批准才能接受采访，随后记者又多次拨打三友小学校长电话和祁东县教育局局长电话，均没有接通。三友小学校长只是回了记者一条短信，让记者到宣传部了解情况。而祁东县宣传部一位刘姓部长表示不清楚此事，将了解情况后再回复。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens hotly discuss the voting results of this year's two sessions
